card.name: Blind Obedience
card.property: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter tapped.

card.name: Dawn of Hope
card.property: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card. {3}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

card.name: Grasp of Fate
card.property: When Grasp of Fate enters, for each opponent, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls until Grasp of Fate leaves the battlefield. (Those permanents return under their owners' control.)

card.name: Greater Auramancy
card.property: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.

card.name: Griffin Aerie
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you gained 3 or more life this turn, create a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying.

card.name: Intangible Virtue
card.property: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

card.name: Karmic Justice
card.property: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls destroys a noncreature permanent you control, you may destroy target permanent that opponent controls.

card.name: Knightly Valor
card.property: Enchant creature When Knightly Valor enters, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance.

card.name: Land Tax
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Leyline of Sanctity
card.property: If Leyline of Sanctity is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

card.name: Phyrexian Unlife
card.property: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. As long as you have 0 or less life, all damage is dealt to you as though its source had infect. (Damage is dealt to you in the form of poison counters.)

card.name: Rest in Peace
card.property: When Rest in Peace enters, exile all graveyards. If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Smothering Tithe
card.property: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: As Foretold
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on As Foretold. Once each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast with mana value X or less, where X is the number of time counters on As Foretold.

card.name: Compulsion
Copy Enchantment
card.property: You may have Copy Enchantment enter as a copy of any enchantment on the battlefield.

card.name: Curiosity
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

card.name: Forced Fruition
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player draws seven cards.

card.name: Fraying Sanity
card.property: Enchant player At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn.

card.name: Hatching Plans
card.property: When Hatching Plans is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw three cards.

card.name: Intruder Alarm
card.property: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. Whenever a creature enters, untap all creatures.

card.name: Kindred Discovery
card.property: As Kindred Discovery enters, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters or attacks, draw a card.

card.name: Leyline of Anticipation
card.property: If Leyline of Anticipation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. You may cast spells as though they had flash.

card.name: Omniscience
card.property: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Rhystic Study
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

card.name: Spreading Seas
card.property: Enchant land When Spreading Seas enters, draw a card. Enchanted land is an Island.

card.name: Bitterblossom
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.

card.name: Dark Tutelage
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value.

card.name: Grave Pact
card.property: Whenever a creature you control dies, each other player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Leyline of the Void
card.property: If Leyline of the Void is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. If a card would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Necropotence
card.property: Skip your draw step. Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard. Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

card.name: Oppression
card.property: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player discards a card.

card.name: Oversold Cemetery
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Polluted Bonds
card.property: Whenever a land an opponent controls enters, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Sanguine Bond
card.property: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.

card.name: Stab Wound
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Vampiric Rites
card.property: {1} {B}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Waste Not
card.property: Whenever an opponent discards a creature card, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Whenever an opponent discards a land card, add {B}{B}. Whenever an opponent discards a noncreature, nonland card, draw a card.

card.name: Aggravated Assault
Blood Moon
card.property: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

card.name: Dragon Mantle
card.property: Enchant creature When Dragon Mantle enters, draw a card. Enchanted creature has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Fiery Emancipation
card.property: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals triple that damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Goblin Bombardment
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Impact Tremors
card.property: Whenever a creature you control enters, Impact Tremors deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Leyline of Lightning
card.property: If Leyline of Lightning is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, Leyline of Lightning deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Mana Flare
card.property: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

card.name: Raid Bombardment
card.property: Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less attacks, Raid Bombardment deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.

card.name: Repercussion
card.property: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, Repercussion deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Shared Animosity
card.property: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature that shares a creature type with it.

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.property: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Defense of the Heart
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Doubling Season
card.property: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

card.name: Garruk's Uprising
card.property: When Garruk's Uprising enters, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, draw a card. Creatures you control have trample. Whenever a creature you control with power 4 or greater enters, draw a card.

card.name: Ground Seal
card.property: When Ground Seal enters, draw a card. Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.

card.name: Hardened Scales
card.property: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

card.name: Leyline of Abundance
card.property: If Leyline of Abundance is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield. Whenever you tap a creature for mana, add an additional {G}. {6}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Nature's Will
card.property: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, tap all lands that player controls and untap all lands you control.

card.name: Parallel Lives
card.property: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

card.name: Primal Vigor
card.property: If one or more tokens would be created, twice that many of those tokens are created instead. If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.

card.name: Prismatic Omen
card.property: Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.

card.name: Season of Growth
card.property: Whenever a creature you control enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.) Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, draw a card.

card.name: Unnatural Growth
card.property: At the beginning of each combat, double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn.

card.name: Utopia Sprawl
card.property: Enchant Forest As Utopia Sprawl enters, choose a color. Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.

card.name: Greater Auramancy
card.property: Other enchantments you control have shroud. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Enchanted creatures you control have shroud.

card.name: Karmic Justice
card.property: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls destroys a noncreature permanent you control, you may destroy target permanent that opponent controls.

card.name: Land Tax
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Smothering Tithe
card.property: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a time counter on As Foretold. Once each turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for a spell you cast with mana value X or less, where X is the number of time counters on As Foretold.

card.property: As Kindred Discovery enters, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters or attacks, draw a card.

card.property: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
